column3: Translation of ""chamber"""""" ""shoe"""""" and ""square"": ?ambro / ?uo / kvadrato (Esp.) chambro / shuo / quadrato (Ido)

column2: gender-neutral by default; masculine and feminine optional
column3: Gender of ""elephant"": elefanto (default) / elefantino (fem.) (Esp.) elefanto (default) / elefantulo (masc.) / elefantino (fem.) (Ido)
Translation of ""warm"" and ""cold"": varma / malvarma (Esp.) varma / kolda (Ido)
Translation of ""big dogs"": grandaj hundoj (Esp.) granda hundi (Ido)
Translation of ""I drink milk"" / ""I milk drink"": ""mi drinkas lakton"" / ""mi lakton drinkas"" (Esp.) ""me drinkas lakto"" / ""me lakton drinkas"" (Ido)
